動物用藥品名稱: 犬兒健 犬瘟熱、傳染性肝炎、犬小病毒活毒、鉤端螺旋體病不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 臺灣維克法蘭斯股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防犬瘟熱，傳染性肝炎，出血性腸炎，犬鉤端螺體病。
ingredients: LIVE ATTENUATED AVIANISED DISTEMPERR VIRUS  (LEDERLE STRAIN)...AT LEAST  10^3 TCID50,LIVE ATTENUATED ADENOVIRUS TYPE 2 (MANHATTAN STRAIN)...   AT LEAST   300 TCID50,LIVE ATTENUATED CANINE PARVOVIRUS (CPV 780916 STRAIN)... AT LEAST 10^4 TCID50,INACTIVATED LEPTOSPIRA CANICOLA (CBS STRAIN)...AT  LEAST  800 X10^6 BACTERIA,INACTIVATED LEPTOSPIRA ICTEROHAEMORRHAGIA (IS3 STRAIN)... AT LEAST  800 X10^6 BACTERIA。
